Articles.Content:
Valkyrie SSTO

And so, after almost a full completion of the ISV venture star, I took the Valkyrie SSTO. Currently Valkiriya has six motors , 4 of them only operate in an atmosphere (Engines VTOL)

Another two , for maneuver in orbit or a flight to other planets. They are more effective in a vacuum.

Atmospheric engine consume less fuel, which allows you to unhurriedly to plant the vertically Valkyrie .

As there is a cargo hold, center shuttle.

The docking port is not yet working.

Planned features.

Done

In the process

Action Achieved partly

Is unknown

1 - entry into orbit (empty, loaded).

2 - Vertical Take-Off \ landing.

3 - Shipping are not less than 25 ~ 30 tons.

4 - possibility docking with the ISV.

5 - Flight between the satellites of the planets.

6 -?

Video

Screenshots

Very nice I'm looking forward to this so I can take the venture star on a grand tour of the kerbin system and have the valkyrie visit all the planet's. I don't mean to be intrusive, but is there an ETA on the valkyrie?

Very nice I'm looking forward to this so I can take the venture star on a grand tour of the kerbin system and have the valkyrie visit all the planet's. I don't mean to be intrusive, but is there an ETA on the valkyrie?

What is the ETA?
It's Estimated Time of Arrival, or basically when the mod might be released

It's Estimated Time of Arrival, or basically when the mod might be released

As far as I understood you correctly you are asking when will the mod? Maybe in a week, I think even before)
Oooh very good I look forward to it
ISV venture star and the Valkyrie, can't wait for both of them.
IMO the Valkyrie was one of the coolest things from Pocahontas in space.

IMO the Valkyrie was one of the coolest things from Pocahontas in space.

Lmbo! Never thought of it that way. I really like ground vehicles..I find myself bulding those more that spaceships these days. Really looking forward to the first working vtol, ssto ship.
is this mod developement active?cause i cant wait for it!
same here, looking forward to it!
is this mod still in development or is it scarped
Given the time since the last post, I'd hazard a guess that this one's DOA now... But until the author comes forward and says so, I will assume that it's merely on an extended hiatus.

As far as I understood you correctly you are asking when will the mod? Maybe in a week, I think even before)

Hey, i just found this mod on youtube and i love it!! Its so cool but i saw that the last time it was talked about was about a year ago. I was wondering if u stopped working on it orrrr ya. Plz get back, i would love to have this mod in my KSP.

I can spend some time polishing the balance if zany wishes. Oh, is he from Ukraine, same as me? Still idk how to contact him.

Can model as well. But no exporting/importing.

As far as I understood you correctly you are asking when will the mod? Maybe in a week, I think even before)

Hi, i would absolutely love to have this ship in my KSP. It looks like it flies like a dream. Pleeeaaaassseeeee get back. Just to at least know if if you stopped working on the project or not. Thanks! Love your work.
Hey guys! Is there anything similar to this SSTO on the forums?? Please Tell, love big powerful and long lasting SSTOs, PLEASE help!
All of ksp I created an avatar mod!
